label: First quarter
description: January 1 – March 31 inclusive, in local timezone. 90 or 91 days.

label: Second quarter
description: April 1 – June 30 inclusive, in local timezone. 91 days.

label: Third quarter
description: July 1 – September 30 inclusive, in local timezone. 92 days.

label: Fourth quarter
description: October 1 – December 31 inclusive, in local timezone. 92 days.
